sources.title: Americana (Full Movie) Drama
sources.description:
Years after alcoholism drove Avery Wells from his career as a film editor, he finds himself back in San Francisco to finish editing a film called Americana - a picture in which his sister Kate is the lead. But as soon as the film is completed, a sudden act of violence turns Avery's prospective sobriety into relapse, and makes him question the motivations of his family and coworkers.

Directed by Zachary Shedd 
2016
Starring:  David Call, Jack Davenport, Kelli Garner

Edited for YouTube ad standards
